metadataAttributes.Title: Accounting Data Analytics Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Develop Data Analytics Skills for Accountants. This specialization develops students’ skills of data preparation, data visualization, data analysis, data interpretation, and machine learning algorithms and their applications to real-world problems.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Machine Learning, Python Programming, Data Visualization (DataViz), Data Preparation, Exploratory Data Analysis, Data Analysis, Predictive Analytics, Data Architecture, Coding, Linear Regression, SQL, Text Analysis,
